backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining products, orders, user profiles, and access‑controlled CRUD operations with authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high‑level features to affected frontend files and components with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files including layout, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and cart provider.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: React context managing cart state with sessionStorage persistence and cart operations.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Type definitions for cart items including product info and variant selections.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen showing an access‑denied message with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for capturing and saving the user's name via a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Gatekeeper component that checks identity, profile, and optional admin status before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai with dynamic year and hostname.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Top navigation bar with logo, search, cart, and user menu with admin and profile options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Hooks to create, update, and delete products via the actor with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile and checking admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth, loading, login, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Hooks to create orders and fetch a user's orders or a specific order.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Hooks to fetch all products or a specific product from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup and theme variables defining colors, layout utilities, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin product management page showing all products with options to create, edit, and delete items.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ProductEditorPa: Form for creating or editing products, handling image uploads, input validation, and save operations.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart, allowing quantity updates, item removal, and navigation to checkout or shopping when empty.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Presents a shipping form, submits orders via createOrder, and handles auth checks and cart clearing on success.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order confirmation details after purchase, including items, shipping info, and total, with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a specific order, including items, shipping address, and status badge.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists the user's orders with status and totals, handling empty and loading states and linking to order details.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single product with images, size/color selection, and add-to-cart logic, including auth checks and profile setup prompts.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Lists all products with search, price filtering, size filtering, and a responsive filter panel UI.
frontend/src/utils/images.ts: Utility functions converting image blobs to URLs and files to Uint8Array for uploads.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Formats prices in rupees and converts cents to rupees.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, feature list, and required images for building a T-shirt marketplace app.
